old:
娘から色々と聞いたが――
わたしも一度はレスタニアを見たいものだ
column2: My daughter has told me so much about it— I wish I could see Lestania at least once.

old:
フィンダムは変わりつつある
暮らす者たちの意識は確実に変わっている
column2:
Phindym is changing.
The attitude of the people living here is definitely changing.

old:
芯なる樹が病めば、竜も、大地も
人も、魔物さえも病んでしまう
column2: If the core tree falls ill, the dragons and the earth will also suffer. Even humans, and the monsters, will fall ill!

old: そう――全ては巡る竜力で繋がっているのだ
column2: That's right—Everything is connected by the power of the dragons.

old:
今にして思えばとても奇妙に思えるのだ
なぜ魔物と戦うように、病魔や厄災と
戦おうとしなかったのか――
column2:
Thinking about it now, it seems very strange.
Why didn't I try to fight against sickness and disaster, 
just as I would fight against enemies?

old:
フィンダムはもうずいぶん犠牲を払ったはずだが――
まだまだ足りないのだろうか
column2:
Phindym must have sacrificed a lot already -
Is it still not enough?

old:
あの黒騎士が、どこから来たのか――
この凶事は黒騎士の仕業なのだろうか――
column2: Where did that black knight come from—Is the black knight responsible for this evil?

old:
黒騎士が凶事に便乗したのか――
して、その目的は？　わからぬことばかりだ
column2:
Did the Black Knight take advantage of the calamity?
And what is their goal? I can't understand anything.

old:
――セシリーは良い子だろう？
わたしの自慢の娘だ
column2:
--Isn't Cecily a good girl?
I'm very proud of her.

old: それなのに、途方もない重荷を負わせてしまったな
column2: And yet, I ended up burdening you with an enormous load.

old:
不思議なものだ
この、病み、淀んだ空気にも馴れてしまうものだな
column2: It's strange. You become accustomed even to this sickly, stagnant atmosphere.

old:
精霊竜ウィルミアは美しく愛らしい竜だ
今でも目を閉じると、優雅に飛ぶ姿が目に浮かぶ
column2: The spirit dragon Willmia is a beautiful and lovely dragon. Even now, when I close my eyes, I can see its graceful flying figure.

old: レスタニアの人よ、なんなりと
column2: Lestania's people, anything you want.

old:
レスタニアの覚者たちよ
心苦しい限りだが、このフィンダム
まだまだ安定への道半ば――
column2: Arisen of Lestania, As much as it pains me, this is a Phindym Still halfway on the path to stability...

old: 最後まで、我々とともに歩んでくれ
column2: Please continue to walk with us, until the end

old: 《原始の雫》とセシリーを頼んだよ
column2: Rely on the "Primeval Drops" and Cecily.

old:
樹内への侵入者という意味では
我々も、魔物もそれほど違わない
もし、ウィルミアに攻撃されたら――
そうだな、全力で逃げるのが得策だろう
column2: In terms of intruders into the forest, both us and the enemy are not much different. If we are attacked by Willmia-- Yeah, it would be best to escape with all our strength.

old:
浄化はすでに始まっているのだが――
想像以上に時間がかかるようだ
column2: The purification has already begun - but it seems to be taking longer than anticipated.

old:
もう何もいうまい
これはさだめだ
抗うことを許されない種類のさだめもある
column2:
I have nothing more to say.
This is fate.
There are types of fate that are not allowed to be resisted.

old:
今はただ待とう――
娘はまた帰ってくる
column2:
I will simply wait for now, 
my daughter will come home again.

old: 竜として生まれ変わってな
column2: To be reborn as a dragon.

old: さあ、早く為すべき事を！
column2: Now, quickly do what needs to be done!

old:
我々はずっとここにいるし、あなたたちの
応援をしているよ
column2: We'll be here all the way, supporting you!
